description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b2scu","text":"This method describes the generation of HeLa cells stably expressing STING-GFP using retroviral transduction in order to study the localization of STING under different conditions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f0ql9","text":"Amplify the coding sequence for human STING using PrimeSTAR GXL DNA polymerase (Takara Bio) according to manufacturer protocol. Primers include a XhoI restriction site at the 5’ end and a SacII restriction site at the 3’ end.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2601","text":"Purify the amplicon from PCR reaction mixture using a NucleoSpin Gel and PCR Cleanup kit (Macherey-Nagel) and run amplicon in an agarose gel to confirm expected size.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpkev","text":"Digest the hSTING PCR product and pEGFP-N1 plasmid using XhoI and SacII restriction enzymes (New England BioLabs) in CutSmart buffer (New England BioLabs) according to manufacturer protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2uk0t","text":"Run digested products in an agarose gel to confirm expected size and purify the DNA from gel using a NucleoSpin Gel and PCR Clean-up kit (Macherey-Nagel).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fv70","text":"Ligate the digested hSTING amplicon and linearized pEGFP-N1 backbone using T4 ligase (New England BioLabs) according to manufacturer protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ftb48","text":"Transform product of ligation reaction into competent E. coli, and plate on kanamycin resistant agar plates. Incubate at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":121,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":127,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3bgkd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4C1A8BE0E09111EBA6A50DBC50B9B4B8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"546C3730E09111EBA6A50DBC50B9B4B8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fc86j","text":"Purify plasmid by Mini-Prep (Qiagen) and sequence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ci93j","text":"Digest the hSTING-EGFP-N1 and pMXs-IRES-Blasticidin Retroviral Vector backbone using XhoI and NotI-HF restriction enzymes (New England BioLabs) in CutSmart buffer (New England BioLabs) according to manufacturer protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ud15","text":"Run digested products in an agarose gel to confirm expected size and purify the DNA from gel using a NucleoSpin Gel and PCR Clean-up kit (Macherey-Nagel)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pMX-STING-GFP retrovirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7vs0s","text":"Plate 5 x 106 Plat-A cells (Cell Biolabs) on a   plate in DMEM (-P/S).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":12,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"43632470E09211EBA6A50DBC50B9B4B8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1579}}}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pMX-STING-GFP retrovirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f0ttv","text":"The following day, transfect cells with   of pMX-STING-GFP using Fugene HD (Promega).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1l5n1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9","error":false,"guid":"4ED63400E09211EBA6A50DBC50B9B4B8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pMX-STING-GFP retrovirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dn4i8","text":"At   post-transfection, plate target HeLa cells at 2.5 x 105 in DMEM (-P/S) 6 well format.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":59,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7v402","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"ED93FFA0E11E11EB9A4A0FCCD2946183","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pMX-STING-GFP retrovirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1frn8","text":"At   post-transfection, collect retroviral supernatant into a falcon tube and supplement with   Polybrene (Millipore).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a7n70","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":259200,"guid":"F3143B70E11E11EB9A4A0FCCD2946183","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"6044A2D0E09211EBA6A50DBC50B9B4B8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1621}}}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pMX-STING-GFP retrovirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3mv62","text":"Pass supernatant through   filter to remove cellular debris and add to target HeLa cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7a85i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.22","error":false,"guid":"6FD96FA0E09211EBA6A50DBC50B9B4B8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1622}}}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pMX-STING-GFP retrovirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d2prd","text":"At   post-transduction, remove retroviral supernatant and replace with fresh DMEM complete.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"574h1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"FDF56B40E11E11EB9A4A0FCCD2946183","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pMX-STING-GFP retrovirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4lqcd","text":"At   post-transduction, sort HeLa cells by FACS to enrich for GFP positive cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7vmr5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"02453D60E11F11EB9A4A0FCCD2946183","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
